pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multivariate Process Capability Indices (MPCI) // It performs the followings Multivariate Process Capability Indices: Shahriari et al. (1995) Multivariate Capability Vector, Taam et al. (1993) Multivariate Capability Index (MCpm), Pan and Lee (2010) proposal (NMCpm) and the followings based on Principal Component Analysis (PCA):Wang and Chen (1998), Xekalaki and Perakis (2002) and Wang (2005). Two datasets are included.
